name: Great Offensive Line Force
description:
Controls

A/D or left arrow/right arrow keys to move left and right.
On mobile, press the left or right side of the screen to move left and right.

Story

You are the lone defender of this gulf, you must survive the waves of enemies until reinforcements arrive. Do your best to not get overwhelmed by the enemies trying to sink your port!

Jam Details

https://itch.io/jam/agd-sa-slam-jam

Theme: Oversaturated
I struggled with this theme a bit to be honest, I ended up taking it to basically mean "Being overwhelmed" which is why I ended up doing a shoot 'em up type game. Also it's set mostly over water.

Mutators
I was hoping to use "Come on and Slam" but I didn't get as much dev time as I would have liked, so I couldn't implement camera shake because I didn't structure my scenes correctly from the get go.

If you count a tiny nod as using a mutator, then you could say I did "Sports" because my game is named "G.O.L.F" as an acronym. The reason for this is I originally planned to make a golf game but quickly realised I wasn't going to get my development time during this jam due to a lot of real life commitments, so I pivoted twice.

Source Code

https://github.com/HellRok/great-offensive-line-force
